sentences.en: All this will make many newspaper old hands feel queasy.
sentences.cn: 目前的状况将使许多传统报纸感到不适应.

sentences.en: Even ginger ale, ginger beer or ginger biscuits can quell queasy feelings.
sentences.cn: 甚至生姜麦芽酒 、 生姜啤酒或生姜饼干都能减轻呕吐不适的感觉.

sentences.en: He was very prone to seasickness and already felt queasy.
sentences.cn: 他快晕船了，已经感到恶心了。

sentences.en: I come over a bit queasy, so I had to lie down.
sentences.cn: 我突然感到头昏想吐, 所以只好躺下.

sentences.en: I felt a little queasy on the ship.
sentences.cn: 我在船上觉得有点晕眩想呕吐.

sentences.en: I was developing the queasy feeling that we were being tested.
sentences.cn: 我心中顿起疑云,莫非人家在考验我们?
那就是使人感到不适的灵魂 吗 ?

sentences.en: Many people, myself included are a little queasy about that vision.
sentences.cn: 许多人, 包括我在内,对这一远见略感不安.

sentences.en: Often queasy, have what remedy, is remedial effect better?
sentences.cn: 经常反胃, 有什么药物, 治疗效果比较好的?

sentences.en: She feels queasy, giddy, whole body is lack of power.
sentences.cn: 她觉得反胃 、 头晕 、 全身乏力.

sentences.en: Some people feel queasy about how their names and addresses have been obtained.
sentences.cn: 一些人为自己的姓名和地址是如何被泄露出去的感到不安。

sentences.en: The sea got rougher, and I began to feel queasy.
sentences.cn: 海上风浪更猛了，我开始感到有点恶心想吐。

sentences.en: The swaying of the smoky little room was making Natalie queasy.
sentences.cn: 这个烟雾腾腾的小房间不住摇晃,使娜塔丽要想呕吐.

sentences.en: There was a queasy mess upon the plate.
sentences.cn: 盘子上有一堆令人作呕的食物.

sentences.en: Travelling on a bus makes me feel queasy.
sentences.cn: 我坐公共汽车感到头晕.

sentences.en: You make me queasy at the stomach with your suave, false little eyes.
sentences.cn: 你那双温柔的, 虚情假意的小眼睛使我倒尽了胃口.

words.tran_cn: 呕吐的；不稳定的；催吐的

trans.tran_cn: （指人）想呕吐的，感到恶心的，易反胃的，（指良心等）感到不自在的
trans.tran_en: feeling uncomfortable because an action seems morally wrong
